revision.text: '''Coba''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with between 10 and 15 points of dry, between 15 and 20 points of bitter, and 0 points of all other flavors. The [[Chesto]] and [[Aguav]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
